com.github.uberroot.ncjbot

Interface RemoteNode.EventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkManager
    Enclosing class:
    RemoteNode

    public static interface RemoteNode.EventListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    An interface to receive events that occur with a remote node.
    Author:
    Carter Waxman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nodeConnectionFailed(RemoteNode node)
      This method is called to indicate a communication error occurred while connecting to or communicating with the given node.
      void nodeStateChanged(RemoteNode node, NodeState state)
      This method is called whenever a change is detected in the state of a node.

    • Method Detail

      • nodeStateChanged

        void nodeStateChanged(RemoteNode node,
                    NodeState state)

        This method is called whenever a change is detected in the state of a node.

        Parameters:
        node - The node that changed state.
        state - The new state of the node.

      • nodeConnectionFailed

        void nodeConnectionFailed(RemoteNode node)

        This method is called to indicate a communication error occurred while connecting to or communicating with the given node.

        Parameters:
        node - The node with which the error occurred.
